name: A Skeleton Story - LudumDare 41
description:
💡Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres  - [Check Story and Universe]

This is my first LudumDare and my second gamejam for The HeartJam at Itch.io 

You can find find my other jam here : I Miss you

A game made under 72 hours for The LudumDare 41

📜Story: 

  • A skeleton that got reborn by a necromancer decides to not do his bidding and instead become a hero.

🌌Universe: 

  • Humorist, medieval-futuristic fantasy, "bizarre"

🕹️Gameplay:

  • Talk to people and get quests and help them out.

🏆Team:

  • 👨‍💻 - @Zukureneno 
  • 🎨 - Indychan  - Deviantart Page
  • 🎵 - Eric Allen Keefer - Twitter  or Website 

⏳Time Spent:

  • 👨‍💻 - Made during 2 days
  •  🎨 - Made during 1 1/2 days
  • 🎵 - Made during 1 day

💿Music:

  • Try and take your time to hear the music
    • You can find all the songs by Clicking Here
      • Town Music   - 4:09  
      • Forest Music - 1:30
      • Main Theme   - 6:24 

🕶️Style:

  • Platformer
  • 2D View

⚒️Tools:

  • GameMaker Studio 2 Desktop
  • HeartBeast Movement Engine Ver. 0.4
  • Dialogue system by friendlycosmonaut
  • Pyxel Edit - Tilesets
  • Krita - Art
  • Spriter Pro - Animation

⭐WishList: 

  • More Quests and Dialogues
